title: Baharistan
author: Jami, 1414-1492
description: Binding: 19th-century red velvet over cardboard with brass centrepiece and corner pieces on upper and lower covers.
provenance: Written for Akbar (1542-1605); from the collection of Sir Gore Ouseley (1770-1844); from the collection of John Bardoe Elliott; presented to Bodleian Library 1859.
record_origin: Image descriptions based in part on Topsfield, A. (2007), Paintings from Mughal India.
